attributes.review: This is the worst app i ever encountered. This app single handily made my dog run into traffic. It made my phone entirely too slow & it is pointless. I can’t believe somebody would think it was actually okay to make this app. Now i have to burry my dog & get a new phone , i have never been so hurt in my life.
attributes.title: I am disgusted

attributes.review:
This app is terrible, its the reason that i had to get a whole new phone, once i opened the app it was only up for a few seconds then shortly after, the app bugged me out of it! Then my phone froze and the screen went white, i sent it to repair but there was nothing they could do about it
Anyways
ARREST THE COPS WHO KILLED BREONNA TAYLOR
BLACK LIVES MATTER
attributes.title: Yeah❤️

attributes.review: this app literally broke my phone while downloading i couldn’t do anything but watch the app download. to go a long with that it started glitching our not only on the app but made my other apps glitch out. this app needs to be fixed. last thing and probably the worst thing is the music when opening this app is the worst thing ever it brought. wood peckers to my house and the started to destroy my house and also brought termites which are currently destroying my house. i mean cmon man i need somewhere to put my titty milk jeez
attributes.title: trash

attributes.review: First off, it took AGES to download. I downloaded this app to see what the heck it was and it’s all just a waste of time. How about instead of spending time on this stupid app we go focus on black lives matter, because we all know that’s way more important.
attributes.title: ✨the worst app I have ever downloaded✨

attributes.review: first off, the app took forever to download and took almost all of my data. it also took up so much space on my phone!! while i was using it, my phone started to glitch out and i couldn’t get into my phone for a week. i couldn’t help but get A NEW PHONE..
attributes.title: bad bad bad

attributes.review: i downloaded it to see what mr. orange, shoot i mean mr. trump had in store and it was so laggy and glitchy. I *tried* to put my number in and it kept freezing. It wouldn’t let me do anything. Needs a new software update or something. Kinda like him🤷‍♂️anyway definitely the worst app in the history.
attributes.title: this poor app :)

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hope of supporting my beautiful Cheeto puff. I was wrong. I then found out that I had to face the Cheeto him self when Cheeto puffs and Donald trump faces came flying out of the sky! I was scared for my life having to look at that many Cheetos! For your own safety, please do not get this app if you are scared of Cheetos too!🐢🐢👁💞✨👄😋😌🧚🏻‍♀️✨🧚🏻‍♀️
attributes.title: My flying Cheeto puff

attributes.review: This app is so bad I can’t even explain it when I went it the first thing was a GIANT orange with a face😟✨he and I would have gone to your trump round up but I lost track of time I was watching the Obamas documentary ✨💥 and then I had some tacos bec ya know TACO TUESDAY 🌟🤪 so I am absolutely DISCONNECTED by this app and the very very ugly orange! So government plz watch your orange bec on already ESCAPED😙✨💥
attributes.title: The WORST APP EVER 🍊🍊

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to get updates of our lovely and wonderful president but instead it started crashing and totally glitched out, i am very very VERY disappointed and we need this app taken down because its a threat. I dont want my phone getting hacked because of this dumb app, take it down.
attributes.title: Yo mom

attributes.review: this app is the worst thing EVER it made my house light on fire also it scared my gorilla way ( haven’t found her yet😡🤬) i would give it 0 stars but u can’t do that. highly DONT recommend unless u want a house fire and also not to mention a orange kept popping up🤢i think it was a disgusting president too
